author: Liam
description: Gives each member a role matching their display name (or a custom handle) for easier tagging across language/character sets. Keeps role names in sync with server nicknames via a background task.
install_msg: Thank you for installing user_handle. Use `[p]userhandle` to see commands. Ensure the bot's role is above the created roles so it can assign them.
short: Per-user role tags synced to display name
